reify

Why reify?

About Projects Blog Contact
All Posts
  by Pulkit Agarwal 14th of January 2016

Last November, Shreyash and I decided to start a blog. It wasnâ€™t planned - it was just a spur of the moment thing. We had a lot of different ideas about what it should be like - the name, the content, the design, even the logo. But we agreed on one major issue - it had to reflect us and what we were going to do.

We ultimately chose the name reify because that encapsulates one of our major goals - to transform our abstract thoughts into concrete implementations. To make a bunch of commands come alive on the screen. To reify our code.
